name: Bright Light Monster Fight
description:
EPILEPSY WARNING: LOTS OF BRIGHT FLASHING LIGHT EFFECTS.

CONTROLS: SPACE to pick up/put down objects, MOUSE to aim, click LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to use an item, WASD or ARROW KEYS to move around.

This is a game programmed by AP Thompson http://apthomson.com/ with art/ visual design done by me. For my 2D Art and Animation class at the NYU Game Center, each of us were given the base game programmed by AP Thompson and asked to give it a visual reskin. I chose to pursue a low-res pixel art 80's arcade style, with lots of flashing lights and bright colors.

Note: I didn't change any of the audio assets or do any audio design to this project as it was for a visual design class. I'm posting this to show my visual design skills only.
